---
title: 12/18/2009 twitter被伊朗人黑掉了...

  - twitter

date: 2009-12-18 15:02:35
---

[caption id="attachment_1502" align="aligncenter" width="290" caption="twitter hacked by iran cyber army"][![twitter hacked by iran cyber army](http://blog.kangzj.net/wp-content/uploads/2009/12/tumblr_kuu3hdXegh1qz7fwgo1_r1_500-290x300.png "tumblr_kuu3hdXegh1qz7fwgo1_r1_500")](http://blog.kangzj.net/wp-content/uploads/2009/12/tumblr_kuu3hdXegh1qz7fwgo1_r1_500.png)[/caption]

下午突然上不去Twitter，还以为Twiiter服务器又不堪重负，挂掉了，结果showfom发过来消息，说是twitter被伊朗人干掉了，有一段时间twitter首页挂的是这段话：<!--more-->
> Iranian Cyber Army
> 
> THIS SITE HAS BEEN HACKED BY IRANIAN CYBER ARMY
> 
> iRANiAN.CYBER.ARMY@GMAIL.COM
> 
> U.S.A. Think They Controlling And Managing Internet By Their Access, But THey Don’t, We Control And Manage Internet By Our Power, So Do Not Try To Stimulation Iranian Peoples To….
> 
> NOW WHICH COUNTRY IN EMBARGO LIST? IRAN? USA?
> 
> WE PUSH THEM IN EMBARGO LIST
> 
> Take Care.
翻译成中文，大体意思就是：
> 美国觉得自己在控制网络？不是的，我们用我们的能量来控制网络！不要逼伊朗人民...
> 
> 现在谁在禁运名单上？伊朗？美国？
> 
> 我们让美国进入禁运名单！
> 
> 好自为之~
很嚣张，很强大...

现在twitter 已经离线，twitter官方还未回应。
